title: Mission Control Dashboard Fixes
description:
Fix identified issues with the Mission Control dashboard:

1. **Resources Section Empty** - API returns [] - Need sample resources or OpenClaw sync
2. **Schedules Not Showing** - Empty queue section - Need cron integration
3. **Tasks Not Tracking Real Work** - Only auto-generated markers - Need meaningful task creation

Create PR for review, do NOT merge to main.

comments.author: architect
comments.content: Subagent spawned to handle these fixes. Create feature branch morpheus/dashboard-fixes

comments.author: agent-morpheus
comments.content: Starting work on dashboard fixes. Will create sample resources, add cron integration, and improve task tracking.
